Returns a ready to use AssetsTools.NET.Extra.AssetsManager with loaded AssetsTools.NET.Extra.AssetsManager.classDatabase, AssetsTools.NET.Extra.AssetsManager.classPackage and AssetsTools.NET.Extra.IMonoBehaviourTemplateGenerator.
